Title: Relates to pupil transportation
Summary: Provides for piggyback contracts for school transportation logistics vehicle drivers to provide pupil transportation.
LawCode: Amd §305, Ed L; amd §§509-a, 509-e & 509-j, add §509-bbb, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to pupil transportation
